channel.title: Designs on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Designs on Konigi

item.title: Unfold
item.description: The site for Norwegian studio Unfold has some interesting & unexpected layout with 45 degree angle text and blocks of color, and panning and sliding interface elements. http://unfold.no/

item.title: BeerCamp
item.description: Best zoomable user interface evah. http://2011.beercamp.com/

item.title: Colosseo Letterpress Poster Site
item.description: Cameron Moll's gorgeous Colosseo poster reimagines the Roman Colloseum with type, and the elegant product site beautiful tells its story. http://colosseotype.com/

item.title: citizenMag
item.description: citizenMag pulls off the bento-box style with their nice use of the jQuery Masonry plugin with this dark and bold take on the online magazine. Via @swissmiss http://citizenmag.citizenm.com

item.title: Alan van Roemburg
item.description: A Melbourne based designer, specialising in graphic design, web design and icons. http://alanvanroemburg.com

item.title: Sugagloss
item.description: Sugagloss, a top end retailer of exclusive adult accessories, underwear and gifts. Built completely in Flash around a massively enhanced Magento backend, it behaves like a designer shoppers dream – and yet with it’s HTML progressive build methodology it ticks all SEO best practice requirements – whilst never for a moment compromising it’s user centric, highly engaging environment. http://www.sugagloss.co.uk

item.title: Made by Many goes SouthWest
item.description: Sweet tweets. The Made by Many crew shows what they're up to at SXSW with this constantly updating status page. Love the fresh/stale indicator. Via @arainert http://sxsw.madebymany.co.uk/

item.title: Pete Usborne - Digital Designer
item.description: Pete Usborne is a British digital designer currently living and working in Sydney. This is the 2010 edition of his latest work http://www.buzzgraphics.co.uk

item.title: Dom Goodrum
item.description: Portfolio showcasing the favourite projects of designer Dom Goodrum. http://www.domgoodrum.com

item.title: Andy Ward
item.description: Portfolio showcasing the illustrations of Andy Ward http://www.andyward.co.uk/

item.title: Rich Brown
item.description: Portfolio showcasing the work of freelance interaction designer and digital creative Richard Brown. http://www.richbrown.info/

item.title: Flower Press Creative Studio
item.description: The redesign of the Flower Press Creative Studio website is fresh, approachable and showcases client work in a case study format. The site uses standards compliant CSS throughout. Since 2001 our full-service creative studio has provided comprehensive services in the areas of brand identity, user experience, development and print. http://www.theflowerpress.net

item.title: Pete Usborne - Oz Edition
item.description: The 2010 Portfolio (Oz Edition) of graphic and digital designer, Pete Usborne http://oz.buzzgraphics.co.uk/projects/samandbuzz.php

item.title: By the People: the Election of Barack Obama
item.description: Promoting the documentary "By The People: The Election of Barack Obama", this site uses full screen flash and full-screen scaling images to get across some of the passion of the actual campaign. http://www.myobamadvd.com

item.title: Teez
item.description: A t-shirt store design re-think http://teez.com.ua
